list.title: BoxLabel
list.description:
4" x 2" label for a box.

Includes the box number, description of contents, date created, and barcode

list.title: Card
list.description: Custom Card component

list.title: ContactCard
list.description: Custom Card for Contact Inputs

list.title: CustomDataGrid
list.description:
Custom DataGrid component, based on MUI's DataGrid. Key functionalities:

  • Abstracts away some default properties
  • Adds easily-settable height, which is then recalculated to the nearest number of rows
  • Configures slotProps

list.title: Header
list.description:
Header for the page

Includes the logo, linked to the home page, and the user's avatar, linked to the account page.

list.title: Invoice
list.description:
Letter-size report for an Invoice

Includes information regarding all individual assets in an invoice with their asset number, description, and price. Also displays summed price for all assets.

list.title: Loading
list.description:
Loading Circle used by LoadingContext and controlled by useLoading

Cannot be closed and is layered above all other components.

list.title: LoadingProvider
list.description: Context to start and stop displaying a loading circle

list.title: Login
list.description: Authorizes the user through Microsoft Azure, then stores user data in session storage. Also checks the CMR database for the user's data (name, email, role). If the user's data is present, stores that data in session storage. If not, creates a new user in the databse and gives them the "User" role (no permissions).

list.title: ModalWrapper
list.description: Wrapper for modal content, to abstract away stylistic choices, buttons, and titles.

list.title: NullCell
list.description: Empty/Placeholder cell for DataGrids

list.title: OnClick
list.description: onClick action for a button

list.title: OrderInfo
list.description: Component to show the details of an order. NOTE: Will not handle undefined order

list.title: OrderInfoTitle
list.description: Custom text bar for Order Info Title

list.title: PackingList
list.description:
Letter-size report for an Invoice's Packing List

Includes all pallets and boxes, separated into two tables, displaying pallet/box numbers and their content descriptions.

list.title: PalletLabel
list.description:
4" x 2" label for a pallet.

Includes the pallet number, description of contents, date created, and barcode.

list.title: PartnerCard
list.description: Input Fields for a partner (Supplier/Customer)

list.title: PartnerModal
list.description: Modal for Partner Configuration (Adding/Editing). Used in Partner page (i.e. Customers/Suppliers)

list.title: PhoneField
list.description: Custom TextField to format phone numbers

list.title: PickTicket
list.description:
Letter-size report for an Invoice's Pick Ticket

Includes all boxes and pallets, separated into two tables, displaying the box/pallet number and their location.

list.title: PlaceholderPDF
list.description: Placeholder component for a PDF, displaying an error message if the prop exists

list.title: ReportModal
list.description:
Modal for displaying a Report in PDF form

Report type is decided by the reportLabel field, with the PDF being populated by the corresponding component. Gives the ability to print the given report from this modal.

list.title: Sidebar
list.description:
Sidebar for the page

Contains dropdowns for each page, and is dynamic based on the user's role. See permissions.js for more information on roles.

list.title: SnackbarProvider
list.description: Context to provide global Snackbar alerts

list.title: StateField
list.description:
Custom Autocomplete Field for State Abbreviations

NOTE: This can be used controlled or uncontrolled, by using only the defaultValue (uncontrolled) or value and handleChange fields (controlled). Only one mode can be used at a time

list.title: TextField
list.description:
Custom Text Field implementing functionality of MUI's TextField to abstract away things like:

  • Removing asterisks on required fields
  • size = "small"

list.title: capitalize
list.description: Capitalizes all words in the given string

list.title: depluralize
list.description: De-pluralizes a string

list.title: formatDate
list.description: Formats date to locale string

list.title: formatNumber
list.description: Formats number to be presentable as data

list.title: formatPrice
list.description: Formats a number to be USD

list.title: getBarcode
list.description:
Generates the canvas data for a barcode

Uses the number parameter to generate a barcode with JsBarcode, returning the resulting data url that can be used as an image src.

list.title: getHeightInPixels
list.description:
Returns an integer value based on the number of pixels. Currently supports the following units:

  • px
  • vh
  • vw
  • %
  • <> (nothing, i.e. just a number)

list.title: module:AuthContext
list.description:
Context to handle MSAL user authentication and custom DB user data.

Logs in with MSAL. If successful, gets the user from the DB. If the user does not exists, creates a user with the "User" role (limited permissions).

list.title: module:Avatar
list.description: Avatar Icon that shows the user's image from Azure, or their initials if not available.

list.title: module:Buttons.Button
list.description:
Custom Button based on MUI's Button, to abstract some properties like:

  • Brighter on hover
  • Font family inheritance
  • Default color
  • Animations

list.title: module:Buttons.CancelButton
list.description: Custom Button specifically for a canceling action. Implements the Custom Button with the customization that it's default color is gray (#5e5e5e)

list.title: module:Buttons.SubmitButton
list.description: Custom Button specifically for a submit action. Implements the Custom Button with the customization that it's default type is "submit"

list.title: module:DropdownArrow
list.description: Icon for a dropdown arrow, with animations and rotation to reflect changes in the "open"-ness of the parent

list.title: module:IconButtons~AddButton
list.description: Add Button

list.title: module:IconButtons~BorderIconButton
list.description: Custom Icon Button that gives the button a 2px-wide border of the given color.

list.title: module:IconButtons~CheckmarkButton
list.description: Checkmark Button

list.title: module:IconButtons~DeleteButton
list.description: Delete Button

list.title: module:IconButtons~EditButton
list.description: Edit Button

list.title: module:IconButtons~GenerateReportButton
list.description: Generate Report Button

list.title: module:IconButtons~PrintButton
list.description:
Print Button

Different than other IconButtons. Used on the ReportModal, so it is filled and changes color when hovered

list.title: module:IconButtons~PutButton
list.description: Put Button (Inventory)

list.title: module:IconButtons~RefreshButton
list.description: Refresh Button

list.title: module:IconButtons~ReportCloseButton
list.description:
Close Report Button

Different than other IconButtons. Used on the ReportModal, so it is filled and changes color when hovered

list.title: module:IconButtons~XButton
list.description: X Button

list.title: module:PermissionWrapper
list.description: Component wrapper for permission-restricted elements

list.title: module:ProtectedRoute
list.description: A wrapper for a route, indicating it's protected by role permissions. If the user is not logged in, this will redirect them to the login page. If the user is logged in, but doesn't have permission, they'll be directed to the 403 page. Otherwise, they're directed to the page they're trying to reach.

list.title: module:SegmentedControl
list.description: Special type of button to select from a given group of options that are visible at all times. The selected option will have a colored pill as a background, which is animated to move as different options are selected.

list.title: module:useBatchCalls
list.description: Custom hook that gives batch API functionality, such as creating multiple items, deleting all items/boxes/pallets, and updating many items.

list.title: module:useBatchCalls~useBatchCalls~deleteInvoiceItems
list.description: Deletes all given PO Items

list.title: module:useBatchCalls~useBatchCalls~deletePurchaseItems
list.description: Deletes all given PO Items

list.title: module:useBatchCalls~useBatchCalls~getBoxOrPallet
list.description: Gets the box or pallet data for the given container number

list.title: module:useBatchCalls~useBatchCalls~getItemsInContainers
list.description: Gets all items for the given boxes and pallets

list.title: module:useBatchCalls~useBatchCalls~postInvoiceItems
list.description: POSTs all given items to the given purchase order ID

list.title: module:useBatchCalls~useBatchCalls~postPurchaseItems
list.description: POSTs all given items to the given purchase order ID

list.title: module:useBatchCalls~useBatchCalls~putInvoiceItems
list.description: PUTs all given items to edit them

list.title: module:useBatchCalls~useBatchCalls~putPurchaseItems
list.description: PUTs all given items to edit them

list.title: module:useBatchCalls~useBatchCalls~putReceivingItems
list.description: PUTs all given items to edit them

list.title: module:useColumns
list.description: Custom hook that contains all columns for the project. This is for use with CustomDataGrid (an extension of MUI's DataGrid), and custom tables for OrderInfo

list.title: module:useFetchData
list.description: Custom hook that fetches data from the given URL, with options to sort the data by a certain field (sortField) and to prioritize a value in that field or another field (priorityValue & priorityField)

list.title: module:useHandleRequest
list.description: Custom hook that handles any API request, given the URL, method, and body data.

list.title: module:useHandleRequest~useHandleRequest~handleRequest
list.description: Handles the API request for the given URL, method, and data. Provide onFail and onSuccess functions for direct error handling.

list.title: module:useItems
list.description:
Custom hook for general static item data.

While this could be converted to a JS file in src/data, the static data here could be moved to an API, so it might be good to keep it separate.

list.title: module:useLocalStorage
list.description: Custom hook to handle getting, setting, and removing items in local storage

list.title: module:useLocalStorage~useLocalStorage~getItem
list.description: Gets the value for the given key in local storage

list.title: module:useLocalStorage~useLocalStorage~removeItem
list.description: Removes the entry for the given key in local storage

list.title: module:useLocalStorage~useLocalStorage~setItem
list.description: Sets item at given key to have the given value in local storage

list.title: module:usePermissions
list.description: Custom hook that gives functions to handle permission-based functions, such as getting a user's permissions or checking if they have permission for a certain module

list.title: module:usePermissions~usePermissions~getPermissions
list.description: Gets all the modules of which the role in session storage has access

list.title: module:usePermissions~usePermissions~hasPermission
list.description: Determines whether the role (saved in session storage) has permission to edit or access the given module

list.title: module:useSelectRow
list.description:
Custom hook that handles commonly used functions for selected rows with a DataGrid.

Specifically, this will handle selecting and unselecting rows, as well as updating a row if it gets changed in the overall data.
